title: ProShares prepares to Launch unique Short Ether Strategy ETF
description: The ProShares investment firm is set to launch a unique Short Ether Strategy Exchange-Traded Fund (ETF). title: There is a 90% Chance of Bitcoin ETF Approval by January: Analyst
description:
According to the famous Bitcoin investor Lark Davis, several analysts believe there is a 90% chance that Bitcoin ETFs will be approved by January. Davis made the statement via a post on X (formerly Twitter) and was supported by other crypto users with a similar sentiment. One of Davis’ respondents, Mister Crypto, noted that he […]

The post There is a 90% Chance of Bitcoin ETF Approval by January: Analyst appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Crypto Analyst Says It’s ‘Inevitable’ Bitcoin Will Soar by Over 150%, Updates Outlook on Chainlink and Avalanche
description:
A closely followed crypto strategist says that it is only a matter of time before Bitcoin (BTC) revisits its all-time high (ATH). Pseudonymous analyst Altcoin Sherpa tells his 196,700 followers on the social media platform X that BTC will eventually soar and work its way back up its all-time high at around $69,000. “Don’t get […]
